org.trellisldp.spi

Interface ResourceService


  • public interface ResourceService
    The ResourceService provides methods for creating, retrieving and manipulating repository resources.

    • Method Summary

      • get

        Optional<Resource> get(IRI identifier)
        Get a resource from the given location
        Parameters:
        identifier - the resource identifier
        Returns:
        the resource

      • get

        Optional<Resource> get(IRI identifier,
                       Instant time)
        Get a resource from the given location and time
        Parameters:
        identifier - the resource identifier
        time - the time
        Returns:
        the resource

      • put

        Boolean put(IRI identifier,
            Dataset dataset)
        Put a resource into the repository
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier for the new resource
        dataset - the dataset
        Returns:
        whether the resource was added

      • getContainer

        Optional<IRI> getContainer(IRI identifier)
        Get the identifier for the structurally-logical container for the resource
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        Returns:
        an identifier for the structurally-logical container Note: The returned identifier is not guaranteed to exist

      • compact

        Stream<IRI> compact(IRI identifier,
                    Instant from,
                    Instant until)
        Compact (i.e. remove the history) of a resource
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        from - a time after which a resource is to be compacted
        until - a time before which a resource is to be compacted
        Returns:
        a stream of binary IRIs that can be safely purged

      • purge

        Stream<IRI> purge(IRI identifier)
        Purge a resource from the repository
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        Returns:
        a stream of binary IRIs that can be safely purged

      • list

        Stream<Triple> list(String partition)
        Get a list of resources in the partition
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition
        Returns:
        a stream of RDF Triples, containing the resource and its LDP type

      • skolemize

        RDFTerm skolemize(RDFTerm term)
        Skolemize a blank node
        Parameters:
        term - the RDF term
        Returns:
        a skolemized node, if a blank node; otherwise the original term

      • unskolemize

        RDFTerm unskolemize(RDFTerm term)
        Un-skolemize a blank node
        Parameters:
        term - the RDF term
        Returns:
        a blank node, if a previously-skolemized node; otherwise the original term

      • export

        Stream<Quad> export(String partition,
                    Collection<IRI> graphNames)
        Export the complete repository as a stream of Quads
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to export
        graphNames - the graph names to export
        Returns:
        a stream of quads, where each named graph refers to the resource identifier

      • getIdentifierSupplier

        Supplier<String> getIdentifierSupplier()
        An identifier supplier
        Returns:
        a supplier of identifiers for new resources
